question: 陥落
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>fall</kanji> during a <kanji>cave in</kanji> you'll <vocabulary>fall</vocabulary> along with everything around you. And that <vocabulary>sinking</vocabulary> feeling in your stomach is because... I mean, well you ARE sinking into the ground.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
